question_text: In which year did Bakshi Jagabandhu lead the Paika Rebellion to protest against the British land revenue policy?
What was the overall unemployment rate in India as reported in the 6th Annual Employment-Unemployment Survey conducted by the Labour Bureau?

If '+' means '−', '−' means '×', '×' means '÷' and '÷' means '+', then what will come in place of the question mark (?) in the following equation?

`32 + 14 − 16 × 8 ÷ 4 = ?`
Who among the following assumed charge of the Comptroller General of India in November 2024?
Which of the following is an example of an operating system commonly used on desktop computers?

`(Left) # * £ 3 9 € # % £ 1 % £ 8 8 1 4 9 % 5 8 & 7 (Right)`

How many such numbers are there each of which is immediately preceded by a symbol and also immediately followed by a symbol?

Which urban local self government body manages small towns with limited municipal functions like street lighting and drainage?
Find the value of K if the quadratic equations $2x^2 + Kx + 8 = 0$ and $3x^2 + 4x + 12 = 0$ have both roots common.

What will come in the place of the question mark (?) in the following equation, if '+' and '−' are interchanged and '×' and '÷' are interchanged?

`38 ÷ 21 + 436 × 4 − 73 = ?`

Seven boxes, A, B, C, D, E, F and G, are kept one over the other but not necessarily in the same order. No box is kept above F. Only three boxes are kept between F and B. Only one box is kept between G and D. D is kept immediately above B. Only four boxes are kept between G and C. A is kept in some place above E. How many boxes are kept below D?
In the Gender Inequality Index (GII) 2022, what rank did India achieve among 193 countries?
Which structural-functional issue in a plant root would hinder gas exchange but not significantly impact water absorption?

options.b: Disrupted stomatal apparatus on aerial organs
options.c: Absence of root hairs due to epidermal deformation

options.a: To go back to the previous option or control
options.b: To close the current dialog box or menu
options.c: To move the focus to the next available option or control
options.d: To select the currently highlighted option

He takes a final left turn, drives 1 km and stops at point P. How far (shortest distance) and towards which direction should he drive in order to reach point A again? (All turns are 90 degree turns only unless specified.)

If 260 is the mean proportion between x and 338, what is the value of x?
Which of the following components is/are NOT a part of the Central Processing Unit (CPU)?

`# : VEC :: BNW : %`

Find the surface area of a sphere whose diameter is equal to 98 cm.

options.a: To measure the vertical temperature profile of the lunar regolith
options.b: To study the Moon's magnetic field
options.c: To measure the Moon's atmospheric pressure
options.d: To assess the Moon's geological composition

question_text: How many cities were initially included under the Smart Cities Mission launched by the Government of India?

The Takht-i-Bahi inscription refers to which Parthian ruler?
Which Article of the Directive Principles of State Policy was added by the 97th Constitutional Amendment Act of the Constitution of India?

`# : JLH :: IKG : %`

A group of numbers/symbols is coded using letter codes as per the codes given below and the conditions that follow. If none of the conditions apply, then codes for the respective number/symbol to be followed directly as given in the table.

| Number/Symbol | 9 | 2 | @ | & | 3 | 7 | 5 | % | 1 | 8 | Δ | 4 | 6 |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|
| Code          | L | C | Z | M | D | W | A | P | R | T | F | B | K |

**Conditions:**
(i) If the first element is a symbol and the last a number, the codes for these two (the first and the last elements) are to be interchanged.
(ii) If the first element is an odd number and the last an even number, the first and last elements are to be coded as ©.
(iii) If both the second and third elements are perfect squares, the third element is to be coded as the code for the second element.

What will be the code for the following group?
`5 & 3 @ 7 % 2`

2. AgriStack is managed solely by the Central Government.
3. The mission seeks to facilitate digital services like credit and insurance to farmers through authenticated data.

If the first element is an odd number and the last an even number, the first and last elements are to be coded as ©.
If both second and third elements are perfect squares, the third element is to be coded as the code for the second element.

question_text: What is the key difference between the Supreme Court's original jurisdiction in federal disputes versus its writ jurisdiction?

options.a: Federal dispute jurisdiction can be exercised suo moto, while writ jurisdiction requires a petition.
options.b: Federal dispute jurisdiction applies to civil matters, while writ jurisdiction applies to criminal matters.
options.c: Federal dispute jurisdiction is exclusive to SC, while writ jurisdiction is concurrent with High Courts.
options.d: Federal dispute jurisdiction is advisory, while writ jurisdiction is binding.

How many people sit between Q and U when counted from the right of Q?
